patthana8.27:1.1_0: Naganthaniyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naganthaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.27:1.1_1: Naganthaniyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naaganthaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.27:1.1_2: Naganthaniyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naganthaniyo ca naaganthaniyo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.27:2.1_0: Naaganthaniyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naaganthaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.27:3.1_0: Naganthaniyañca naaganthaniyañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naaganthaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.27:4.1_0: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca. (Sabbattha pañca.)
